summary: A stronger duplicate of the steel arrow.
descriptionHtml:
Phew-- I don't know anything about mods or making mods but I am learning. Slowly. This mod is just a new arrow with the steel arrow look. I rp as a ranger and I'm always disappointed with having to use obnoxious and flashy bows just to be able to take down a deer in one hit. I found a mod that makes the hunting bow stronger, which was great but I couldn't find any steel arrow type mods that have a quiver to match the hunting bow.

So I did a little googling and the Ranger's Arrow was born. I'm working on making them craftable, but I keep breaking things when I try right now. (Practice makes perfect right?)

The Rager Arrows deliver[b] 24 damage[/b], versus the 10 that the original steel arrow delivers. This is the only change made to the arrows.

100 Arrows can be found in Solitude by the blacksmith on one of the boxes. (See Images.) They can also be added by console for now. As soon as I know how to make them craftable I will update this mod. 

To install, run the mod manager or extract the mod to your data folder. 
[b]
I STRONGLY recommend this mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53299/?]Improved Hunting Bow[/url][/b]
author: Ladyburlesque
